name: hexjumper
text: A comment left by hexjumper was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by _cheesekayke, SoManyWhales, VictoriaW)

name: catachresis
text: It is certainly one of my favourite lines ever.

name: katsura
text: It's how he says it so conversationally that really makes it.

name: deancain29
text: its clearly something he's said before - I love that hes not only on first name terms with the Captain, but that he shortens that to 'B'

name: drskradley
text: Captain B's response was obviously quick, as he erased it without hesitation. He don't care what's on it - it's frikkin' Ray , man.

name: bixschmix
text: Ray Smuckles: He Pays For the Pings.

name: i_love_kate
text: Captain B probably started accessing the relevant databases for erasing all evidence of Ray's recently committed crimes as soon as he heard who was calling.

name: surelysmack
text: Its the procedurally equivalent of clearing my firefox search history

name: mirzabah
text: Ray Smuckles: He Gets Pings DONE.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Life in Achewood must be hella nice if you know who to know.

name: quinlaenar
text:
> Life in Achewood must be hella nice if you know Ray.

Fix'd.

name: thesoulbear
text: There is a key on Captain B's keyboard that says "Erase all history of crimes Ray Smuckles has committed recently".

name: bourbonsamurai
text: and also an option on my speed dial.

name: dj_douche
text: Although your comment urging the creation of a t-shirt containing text that you enjoyed is somewhat formulaic, you are chubbied nonetheless, as the line you quoted is such an enjoyable one.

name: never_die
text:
Ray Smuckles: He Gets Things Done.
Even evading jail time.

name: teknofatcat
text: Man, Ray must be hell of connected at the sheriff's department! Lucky bugger.

name: rowboat
text: Ray is runnin' shit.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Without even getting out of bed, Ray effortlessly schools the Achewood Police Department.

name: cicadalek
text: It'd be easy to assume Ray gets away with crime because he's rich and unfluential, but in reality it's just because captain B knows that any 'crimes' commited by Ray were just high spirits, 'cos he's such a great guy.

name: shmuckeles
text: ain't that the truth. b knows that ray's "good people" and he was just "horsing around"

name: aperson
text: I'm sure the free Hummer helped also.

name: brokeaccount
text:
Any man would say yes to anything after having been given a free hummer .

HEY-O!

name: lokier
text: love the euro "FIN" at the end.  Problem neatly solved.

name: rotating-dog
text: For those who care, the second Neil Young reference in the strip titles. Also This one.

name: rowboat
text: I care now.

name: bourbonsamurai
text: Good call, dog that rotates! Both from the same song, too.

name: siah
text: I like this one but he seems to kind of rush it.

name: albanyshaker
text: This might just be my all-time favorite strip. Everything is there!

name: thesyndicate88
text: Notice Ray is only interested in erasing the history of crimes he's committed RECENTLY.

name: deusoma
text: I get the impression that Ray just does this every once in a while, like, say, erasing your internet history so people don't know you've been looking at ladies sitting on birthday cakes.

name: invidious
text: Captain B?  Please clear my felony cache.  Thanks, dogg, you da man.

name: professorhazard
text: The sheriff's son can drive his new Hummer on such as grey rocks, if he so chooses.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

-Ray-
What a damn fine day.
I got to improve my game!

-Roast Beef-
kind of dull afternoon
S*itty afternoon.

-Pat-
Kleenex has just lost a customer.
Water Balloons are NOT Funny.

-Teodor-
Iron Chef Risotto
That jackass.

-Philippe-
Good Morning!
What happened to my fun breakfast!?
I'm getting up earlier and earlier these days!

-Mr. Bear-
An Uncommon Indulgence.
A Sudden Flush.

-Lyle-
stan's in
adios stan the man

-Molly-
Wow too much barbecue
Uh, bye, Roast Beef?

-Onstad-
Breakfast risotto
WTF
A day outdoors.

-Nice Pete-
Peter H. Cropes

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: I don't think too much of that dude down at Clancy's.
Roast Beef: Man do I feel dumb
Philippe: I got lost!
Lyle: new mexican place workin out alright
Onstad: No sign of Téodor today.

name: stop
text: Is that former Sergeant Bill Callahan? If so, he's been promoted!

name: godfatherofsouls
text: see the hummer and the Damage Done

name: libelandslander
text: This is the second time tonight that my music (on random) synced up with what the comic was referencing. awesome
